name: Barilla Creamy Genovese Pesto and Rustic Basil Pesto Sauce Four Pack
short_description: Smooth, creamy texture and timeless Italian flavor; ideal as spaghetti sauce for family dinners
Blend of fragrant basil and grated cheeses
Carefully crafted from high-quality Italian ingredients for cellentani pasta dishes
Pairs perfectly with your favorite Barilla pasta and Barilla pasta sauce
Can be also be added to sandwiches, served as a dip and more
product_description: Pasta night just got a whole lot tastier! Barilla Creamy Genovese Pesto delivers deliciously creamy texture and authentic Italian flavor, adding an indulgent twist to traditional Pesto sauce. Rustic Basil Pesto adds authentic Italian flavor to a variety of dishes your whole family will enjoy. This pasta sauce jar is carefully crafted from high-quality ingredients, including fragrant Italian basil and freshly grated cheeses, Barilla Pesto is a versatile sauce that home chefs can incorporate into penne pasta, sandwiches, and more. Get inspired with Barilla! Enjoy the full range of Barilla pasta and pasta sauces, including Barilla Ready Pasta, Protein Pasta, Gluten Free Pasta, Chickpea Pasta and Red Lentil Pasta—plus an expanding line of Pesto sauces, each one versatile enough to inspire new heights of creativity in the kitchen.

name: Mantova Vegan Pesto 6.7oz Jar (Pack of 2) – Authentic Italian Plant-Based Pasta Sauce, Dairy-Free Genovese-Style Pesto with Fresh Basil, Oil, and Nuts – Ideal for Pasta, Sandwiches, and Recipes
short_description: Authentic Italian Flavor – Crafted in Italy with fresh basil, olive oil, and nuts for a true Genovese-style pesto experience, delivering vibrant, aromatic flavor in every spoonful.
100% Plant-Based and Dairy-Free – Enjoy all the creamy, herby richness of classic pesto with a completely vegan recipe using tofu, perfect for those avoiding dairy without sacrificing taste.
Versatile Gourmet Sauce – Ideal for tossing with pasta, spreading on sandwiches, drizzling over roasted vegetables, or enhancing pizza and wraps with bold Mediterranean flavor.
Convenient 6.5oz Jar – Resealable glass jar preserves freshness and makes it easy to elevate everyday meals with a touch of Italian tradition, anytime.
product_description: Through the generations, the Mantova family has become recognized as premier testers and tasters, curating only the finest spreads and toppings to bear the family name. Our Mantova Vegan Basil Pesto is a vegan blend of fresh basil, garlic, tofu, cashews, pine nuts, extra virgin olive oil. Our vegan-friendly pesto is carefully crafted to maintain traditional Italian flavor without the cheese. Easily enhance a simple pasta dish with a satisfying blend of flavors that’s perfectly authentic. Simply toss into spaghetti, macaroni, linguine, or any other pasta that you love. Or spread on top of pizza, toast or crusty bread. Instantly add authentic, exciting flavor no matter how you choose to enjoy it.

name: Polli Pesto Sauce Traditional Basil | Pasta Risotto and Bruschetta Sauce | Made In Italy - 2 Pack (6.7 oz Each)
short_description: Rich, Classic Flavor with Authentic Italian Taste Polli’s Traditional Basil Pesto (Pesto Genovese) combines fresh basil, Grana Padano, Pecorino Romano cheese, pine nuts, and extra virgin olive oil for a smooth texture and bold aroma. This is a true spaghetti sauce experience, offering the depth and richness of a classic traditional pasta sauce.

Quality Basil, from field to jar The basil in our pestos is 100% certified Italian origin. It’s harvested by our farms, transported to our factories, and processed within 24-hours of picking. This ensures that our pesto is as fresh as can be and filled with flavour!

Multi-Use Sauce – Perfect for Pasta, Risotto, and More This versatile pesto works as a pasta sauce, risotto sauce, or Italian bruschetta spread, and also makes a delicious veggie dip or condiment. Whether you’re cooking weeknight pasta sides or preparing party appetizers, it’s one of the most flavorful sauces for food lovers.

Made in Italy – Over 150 Years of Heritage Proudly crafted and bottled in Italy by Polli, a trusted brand since 1872. With a strong focus on quality, tradition, and innovation, we’ve been creating authentic Italian pasta sauces for over 150 years.

Convenient 6.7 oz Jar – Ready to Use Anytime This 6.7 oz glass jar is ready to serve straight from the fridge—no prep required. It’s perfect for quick meals, snacks, or elevated dishes. Use it as a quick pasta sauce or mix into your favorite pasta sides and dips for instant flavor.

name: Mezzetta Artisan Ingredients Basil Pesto 6.25 Ounce Jar- Traditional Italian Pesto alla Genovese with Fresh Basil, Parmesan & Pine Nuts - Rich & Savory Sauce for Pork, Pasta & More (Pack of 6)
short_description: Elevate Your Culinary Creations: Crafted from a traditional Italian recipe, Artisan Ingredients Basil Pesto by Mezzetta transforms ordinary dishes into flavorful masterpieces. The harmonious blend of fresh basil, extra virgin olive oil, and savory Parmesan cheese brings authentic Genovese flavor to your table. Ideal for adding a gourmet touch to grilled pork or enhancing your favorite pasta, this pesto promises to delight your taste buds and impress your guests.

A Taste of Italy at Home: This basil pesto sauce lets you savor the bold and aromatic essence of classic Italian cuisine in the comfort of your kitchen. Its rich blend of fresh ingredients, including pine nuts and garlic, creates a perfect balance of flavors that makes every meal a culinary journey to Italy. Enjoy it in salads, sandwiches, or as a pizza topping, and turn everyday meals into gourmet experiences.

Natural Ingredients for Pure Enjoyment: Indulge in the high-quality ingredients used in our basil pesto for a guilt-free culinary experience. Free from artificial preservatives and flavors, this pesto not only ensures authentic taste but also supports a healthier lifestyle. Feel confident in serving your family a product that prioritizes quality and authenticity, making it an excellent choice for health-conscious food lovers.

Versatile and Easy to Use: Whether you are a seasoned chef or a kitchen novice, our fresh basil pesto offers unmatched versatility and convenience. Ready to serve straight from the jar, it seamlessly transforms simple recipes into exquisite meals. From enriching pasta to bringing life to roasted veggies, it's your perfect kitchen companion, saving time while maintaining restaurant-quality taste.

Authentic Flavor, Artisan Quality: Experience the artisan touch in every jar with Mezzetta's dedication to quality and tradition. Our pesto is crafted to preserve the rich, traditional taste that makes Italian cuisine beloved worldwide. Whether you're hosting a dinner party or preparing a cozy family meal, elevate your culinary endeavors with the trusted choice for true flavor enthusiasts.
